title: UPM Specialty Papers and Lohmann join forces to uplift design for recycling for tape products - Packaging Europe
summary: Lohmann and UPM Specialty Papers are joining forces to drive the tape industry's progress in designing paper liners for recycling with new products and closed-loop solutions. Lohmann introduced DuploCOLL ECO, its bio-based and solvent-free tape line, which provides equal performance in its white paper liner as standard darker alternatives, enabling the highest possible quality for recycling. Building on closed-loop paper liner recycling solution UPM LinerLoop, the collaboration also aligns with Lohmann’s strategy to develop sustainability-minded adhesive technologies.

title: Plastic Recycling Industry at Crossroads: Uncertainty and Shrinking Demand Shifts - RecyclingPortal
summary: The European plastic recycling industry is facing challenges due to the lack of manufacturers' commitment to using recycled materials and the growing imports of recycled plastics from third countries.
